languages.text: {n}Шепоток, в котором страх мешается с изумлением и восхищением, проходит по толпе. Наконец она исторгает из себя троих людей — пожилую женщину и двух мужчин — по-видимому, предводителей. Они неловко кланяются вам.{/n} "Л-лорд-капитан! Вы снизошли к нам!"

{n}A whisper passes through the crowd, and you detect a mixture of fear, astonishment, and joy in their reactions. Finally, three people break away from the crowd — an elderly woman and two men. These must be the leaders. They bow clumsily before you.{/n} "L-Lord Captain! You have come down to us!"
languages.original_text: {n}Шепоток, в котором страх мешается с изумлением и восхищением, проходит по толпе. Наконец она исторгает из себя троих людей — пожилую женщину и двух мужчин — по-видимому, предводителей. Они неловко кланяются вам.{/n} "Л-лорд-капитан! Вы снизошли к нам!"

languages.text: {n}人群中传来一阵窃窃私语，你在他们的反应中看到了恐惧、惊讶与喜悦。到了最后，三个人从人群中挤了出来。那是一个年迈的妇人与两个男人，他们一定就是领头人。这三个人笨拙地在你面前鞠了一躬。{/n}“舰、舰长大人！你下到我们这里来了！”
languages.original_text: {n}A whisper passes through the crowd, and you detect a mixture of fear, astonishment, and joy in their reactions. Finally, three people break away from the crowd — an elderly woman and two men. These must be the leaders. They bow clumsily before you.{/n} "L-Lord Captain! You have come down to us!"

traits.locale_text: {n}人群中传来一阵窃窃私语，你在他们的反应中看到了恐惧、惊讶与喜悦。到了最后，三个人从人群中挤了出来。那是一个年迈的妇人与两个男人，他们一定就是领头人。这三个人笨拙地在你面前鞠了一躬。{/n}“舰、舰长大人！你下到我们这里来了！”
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderWeak

languages.text: {n}Un susurro recorre la multitud, e identificas una mezcla de miedo, sorpresa y alegría entre las reacciones. Finalmente, tres personas se distancian de la multitud: una mujer anciana y dos hombres. Deben de ser sus líderes. Hacen una reverencia torpe ante ti.{/n} «¡L-Lord Capitán! ¡Ha bajado a vernos!».
languages.original_text: {n}A whisper passes through the crowd, and you detect a mixture of fear, astonishment, and joy in their reactions. Finally, three people break away from the crowd — an elderly woman and two men. These must be the leaders. They bow clumsily before you.{/n} "L-Lord Captain! You have come down to us!"

Finalmente, tres personas se distancian de la multitud: una mujer anciana y dos hombres. Deben de ser sus líderes. Hacen una reverencia torpe ante ti.{/n} «¡L-Lord Capitán! ¡Ha bajado a vernos!».
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderWeak

languages.text: {n}群衆の間にささやきが流れ、恐怖、驚き、喜びが入り混じった反応が感じられる。最後に、3人が群衆から前に出てきた…年配の女性と2人の男性だ。リーダーたちに違いない。彼らはあなたの前で不器用にお辞儀をする。{/n}「ロ、ロード・キャプテン！我々のもとへ来てくださったのですね！」
languages.original_text: {n}A whisper passes through the crowd, and you detect a mixture of fear, astonishment, and joy in their reactions. Finally, three people break away from the crowd — an elderly woman and two men. These must be the leaders. They bow clumsily before you.{/n} "L-Lord Captain! You have come down to us!"

traits.locale_text: {n}群衆の間にささやきが流れ、恐怖、驚き、喜びが入り混じった反応が感じられる。最後に、3人が群衆から前に出てきた…年配の女性と2人の男性だ。リーダーたちに違いない。彼らはあなたの前で不器用にお辞儀をする。{/n}「ロ、ロード・キャプテン！我々のもとへ来てくださったのですね！」
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderWeak

languages.text: {n}Ein Raunen geht durch die Menge und du bemerkst in den Reaktionen der Leute eine Mischung aus Furcht, Erstaunen und Freude. Schließlich lösen sich drei Personen aus der Masse — eine ältere Frau und zwei Männer. Das müssen die Anführer sein. Sie verneigen sich ungelenk vor dir.{/n} "L-Lord Captain! Ihr seid zu uns hinabgekommen!"
languages.original_text: {n}A whisper passes through the crowd, and you detect a mixture of fear, astonishment, and joy in their reactions. Finally, three people break away from the crowd — an elderly woman and two men. These must be the leaders. They bow clumsily before you.{/n} "L-Lord Captain! You have come down to us!"

Schließlich lösen sich drei Personen aus der Masse — eine ältere Frau und zwei Männer. Das müssen die Anführer sein. Sie verneigen sich ungelenk vor dir.{/n} "L-Lord Captain! Ihr seid zu uns hinabgekommen!"
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderWeak

languages.text: {n}Un murmure parcourt la foule, dans lequel vous décelez un mélange de peur, de stupéfaction et de joie. Au bout de quelques instants, trois individus se détachent du groupe, une femme âgée et deux hommes. Les meneurs, sans doute. Ils s'inclinent gauchement devant vous.{/n} « {mf|S-seigneur-capitaine|S-seigneure-capitaine} ! Merci d'être {mf|descendu|descendue} nous voir ! »
languages.original_text: {n}A whisper passes through the crowd, and you detect a mixture of fear, astonishment, and joy in their reactions. Finally, three people break away from the crowd — an elderly woman and two men. These must be the leaders. They bow clumsily before you.{/n} "L-Lord Captain! You have come down to us!"

Ils s'inclinent gauchement devant vous.{/n} « {mf|S-seigneur-capitaine|S-seigneure-capitaine} ! Merci d'être {mf|descendu|descendue} nous voir ! »
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderWeak

languages.text: {n}Kalabalığın arasından bir fısıltı duyuluyor. İnsanlardaki korku, hayranlık ve neşe duygularını sezebiliyorsun. Nihayet kalabalığın içinden üç kişi öne çıkıyor: İki adam ve yaşlıca bir kadın. Bunların, liderleri olduğunu düşünüyorsun. Önünde beceriksizce eğiliyorlar.{/n} "L... Lord Kaptan! Teşrif etmişsiniz!"
languages.original_text: {n}A whisper passes through the crowd, and you detect a mixture of fear, astonishment, and joy in their reactions. Finally, three people break away from the crowd — an elderly woman and two men. These must be the leaders. They bow clumsily before you.{/n} "L-Lord Captain! You have come down to us!"
